sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The prayer of Collonel Iohn Lambert in captivity. This prayer is not in Hebrew, but was translated out of the Greek by his chaplain for the Collonels own proper use. Lambert, John, 1619-1683, attributed name.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
[s.n.], London : printed in the year 1660.
A satire; not in fact by Lambert. Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 10". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
